sentences.en: All parts of the sphere were nicely counterpoised.
sentences.cn: 球的各个部分均呈平衡。

sentences.en: Astronomers have divided the celestial sphere into a total of 88 regions.
sentences.cn: 天文学家已把天球划分为88个区域.

sentences.en: Because the earth spins, it is not a perfect sphere.
sentences.cn: 因为地球旋转，所以它不是个完完全全的球体。

sentences.en: Before I became a widow, I was in very different sphere.
sentences.cn: 在我居孀之前, 我是处在完全不同的圈子里的.
生物学不是我研究的范围.

sentences.en: Every day's delay is dearly purchased in the wider sphere.
sentences.cn: 每一天拖延,都是在更广泛的领域内用高昂的代价换来的.

sentences.en: Give my love to Randolph should he come into your sphere.
sentences.cn: 倘若伦道夫进入你的地区,请转达我对他的慰问.

sentences.en: He has extended his sphere of influence to the world of banking.
sentences.cn: 他已把自己的势力范围扩展到金融界.

sentences.en: In this way the sphere is transformed into an ellipsoid.
sentences.cn: 于是球体变成为椭球体.

sentences.en: Some scientists relegate parapsychology to the sphere of quackery.
sentences.cn: 一些科学家把灵学归类到骗术范围.

sentences.en: Suddenly, out in the night sky, a bright sphere came into view.
sentences.cn: 突然, 机外的夜空中有个发光的圆球映入眼帘.

sentences.en: television’s increasing role in the political sphere
sentences.cn: 电视在政治领域中越来越重要的作用

sentences.en: The gas escapes from the sphere of the reaction.
sentences.cn: 气体产物从反应体系中逸出.

sentences.en: They are portions of a sphere, a torus or a cone.
sentences.cn: 他们是一球形 、 环形或锥形的一部分.

sentences.en: They now felt themselves, at least, inhabitants of the same sphere.
sentences.cn: 他们此时至少感到双方是同一天地中的居民了.

sentences.en: They see the region as their natural sphere of influence due to their historical links and a shared language.
sentences.cn: 基于历史上的联系和共同的语言，他们把该地区看成是自己天然的势力范围。

sentences.en: They strike me as changed and rapt beyond my sphere.
sentences.cn: 我发现他们变了,着了魔似地,超出了我的范畴.

sentences.en: Women have often been excluded from positions of power in the public sphere.
sentences.cn: 女性常常被排除在公共领域的实权职位之外。
